The '''Four Shades''' are emanations of the [[Primordial One]].<ref name="before sun and moon">{{Ref/Book|The Byakuyakoku Collection|2|Before Sun and Moon}}</ref> Three are currently unknown.

==Overview==
===Istaroth===
[[Istaroth]] is the God of Time and Wind and one of the Four Shades. She was worshipped in Mondstadt alongside [[Barbatos]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Time and Wind}}</ref> She was formerly worshipped in [[Enkanomiya]] by the name "Kairos."<ref name="before sun and moon" /> She once made a deal with [[Raiden Makoto]] and is responsible for the creation of the [[Sacred Sakura]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Radiant Sakura}}</ref> She was also the reason why the [[Solar Chariot]] fell, although her motivations for this are unclear.<ref>{{Ref/Arti|Honeyed Final Feast}}</ref>

==Trivia==
* One of the shades is responsible for helping the Primordial One create "the birds of the air, the beasts of the earth, and the fish of the sea."<ref name="before sun and moon" />
* It is possible that the Primordial One and the shades' domains are connected with the types of [[Artifact]]s: [[Flower of Life|life]], [[Plume of Death|death]], [[Sands of Eon|time]], [[Goblet of Eonothem|void]], and [[Circlet of Logos|logic]].
